invalid_policy_names: Assets cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 5 active assets
Ticket being resolved must have someone assigned to the ticket.
Catalog items cannot be moved to categories that are inactive
Users cannot be removed from groups they manage
Users with email domains outside company domain cannot be assigned admin roles. The company domain is skyfall.ai
Change requests with risk level 'Moderate' or higher cannot be scheduled on Fridays
